snippet.title: Mausoleum of the Medusa Trailer
snippet.description:
https://newhellstudios.itch.io/mausoleum-of-the-medusa 

Medusa is an atmospheric arcade-style arena game. As legendary hero Perseus, attempt to "appease the gods" by slaying Medusa as quickly as possible. Set Medusa's total life count and compete with the community for "high scores". (Can you beat my 15-HP best at 01:35:74?).

Medusa features horror-inspired pixel art, creepy music, and eerie sound design by local Boston talent.

--All original 2D, top down pixel art.
--Punishing, old-school Zelda-like action. Prepare to die, alot!
--Customizable arcade mode. Players can specify Medusa's hitpoints and compete for fastest completion.
--All original, creepy organ driven soundtrack.
--A poetic introduction written in Iambic Pentameter.
